dp:metadata.dc:title: Dark Passage
dp:metadata.dc:creator: Danielle Girard
dp:metadata.dc:description: Rookie Club member Cameron Cruz was devastated when her lover was killed during an undercover assignment. Pregnant with his child, she finds the strength to give birth to her son and return to Special Ops.As Cameron's team works to shut down a human trafficking operation, she witnesses the shooting of a fellow officer. The man holding the gun—her dead lover—very much alive.Caught between the love she still feels for her son's father and doing what she knows is right, Cameron races to unravel her lover's connection to the human traffickers and lands at the department's front door, with her own life on the line.PRAISE FOR THE ROOKIE CLUB:"A gritty new cop series that can beat out the "old boys network" any day of the week." ~Lisa Gardner, New York Times bestselling author"[some] of the strongest female characters to have graced the genre in years." ~John Connolly, New York Times bestselling author"...grabs your curiosity and your emotions, and then shakes the hell out of both."...
